overview.description: Maharashtra, located in western India, is known for its bustling cities, historic forts, and scenic beaches. Established as a state on May 1, 1960, it features attractions like Mumbai and Pune.

top_destinations.name: Mumbai
top_destinations.description: The financial capital with Gateway of India and Marine Drive.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Visit Elephanta Caves; avoid peak monsoon.

top_destinations.name: Pune
top_destinations.description: Known for its forts like Shaniwar Wada and cultural heritage.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Explore Aga Khan Palace; visit during winter.

top_destinations.name: Mahabaleshwar
top_destinations.description: A hill station with strawberry farms and scenic views.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Visit Venna Lake; carry warm clothes.

culinary_delights.name: Leopold Cafe
culinary_delights.description: Famous for its vibrant ambiance and food.

culinary_delights.name: Café Coffee Day
culinary_delights.description: Cozy spot for coffee and snacks.

culinary_delights.name: Shiv Sagar
culinary_delights.description: Popular for vada pav and misal pav.

culinary_delights.name: Peshawri
culinary_delights.description: Offers a variety of North Indian specialties.

must_visit_spots.name: Gateway of India
must_visit_spots.description: An iconic monument overlooking the Arabian Sea.
must_visit_spots.tip: Visit early morning to avoid crowds.

must_visit_spots.name: Ajanta and Ellora Caves
must_visit_spots.description: UNESCO sites with ancient rock-cut caves.
must_visit_spots.tip: Allocate a full day for exploration.

must_visit_spots.name: Lonavala
must_visit_spots.description: A hill station with waterfalls and forts.
must_visit_spots.tip: Visit during monsoon for lush greenery.

must_visit_spots.name: Tadoba National Park
must_visit_spots.description: A tiger reserve with diverse wildlife.
must_visit_spots.tip: Book a safari for the best experience.

must_visit_spots.name: Shaniwar Wada
must_visit_spots.description: A historic fort in Pune with light shows.
must_visit_spots.tip: Attend the evening sound and light show.

must_visit_spots.name: Elephanta Caves
must_visit_spots.description: Rock-cut caves with Hindu and Buddhist sculptures.
must_visit_spots.tip: Take a ferry from Gateway of India.

travel_essentials.how_to_reach: By road: Mumbai is 1,400 km from Delhi (NH48, 24-26 hrs). By train: Mumbai Central connects major cities. By air: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Airport (Mumbai).
travel_essentials.tips: Carry light clothing; book accommodations in advance.
